item.title: @KordingLab @WiringTheBrain @DLBarack @DrYohanJohn A question I asked over on mastodon was if manifolds as popular in neuroscience currently provide evidence of interesting forms of "emergence" in the sense that the neural population has properties that are not present in more local firing. Thoughts?
